overview: Remar and Attila are a couple of surfers who also deal drugs to make a living. They are trying to set up a final deal with local drug lord, Calavera, when their friend True Blue is busted by the cops. Blue talks too much in the police station and Calavera is out for revenge because of the betrayal.
tagline: As gang leaders they were brutal - but when they tried to get a normal life hell broke loose!
title: Red Surf
